title: Barista Simulator
description:
Barista Simulator is a very realistic single player barista coffee simulation game. The game allows you to experience what Barista makes. Get ready to work with coffee machines. You can make a wide variety of coffees and you must be able to upgrade your machines to unlock new coffee recipes. Just some of the coffees you can make are Filter coffee, Latte, Cappuccino, Espresso, Mocha, Americano and Ice coffees.
The customers coming to your shop will want various coffees and you should improve your machines to make the coffees they want. Itâ€™s your choice to make your own specialty coffee blend , but first make sure your customers are happy with it. Pocket Mirror ~ GoldenerTraum

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 with 3,1 GHz or AMD FX-8150 with 3,6 GHz or higher
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (2 GB VRAM) or higher
